00045 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 //****************************Class FitsKey****************************************
00047 
00048 /* this class is only there to add the convenience functionnality of reading the
00049 keys throuth statements like :
00050 int nx = image.KeyVal("NAXIS1");
00051 or 
00052 cout << image.KeyVal("NAXIS1") << endl;
00053 
00054 setting & deleting keys is done directly in the FitsImage/ FitsHeader classes.
00055 Since there is no point in building such an object directly,
00056 the constructor is private. So before adding any functionnality to
00057 FitsKey, consider adding it in FitsHeader class. */
00058 
00059 
00060 class GtransfoLin;
00061 class VirtualInstrument;
00062 
00063 #define NOVAL string("NOVAL")
00064 
00066 
00067 class FitsKey { 
00068 
00069   friend class FitsHeader;
00070 
00071   private :
00072 /* this could become a pointer if cfitsio routines use const when applicable (e.g.fits_read_key) */
00073       char keyName[32];
00074       fitsfile *fptr;
00075       double dval;
00076       string sval;
00077   bool warn;
00078   // useless to call directly:
00079   FitsKey(const string &KeyName, fitsfile *Fptr, const bool Warn) : fptr(Fptr), warn(Warn){ strncpy(keyName,KeyName.c_str(),32);};
00080 
00081 public :
00082   // constructors without a fits file
00083       FitsKey(const string &KeyName, const double& val) :  
00084           fptr(0), dval(val) 
00085          { strncpy(keyName, KeyName.c_str(), 32); char toto[30]; sprintf(toto,"%f",val); sval = toto;};
00086 
00087       FitsKey(const string &KeyName, const int val) :  
00088           fptr(0), dval(val) 
00089          { strncpy(keyName, KeyName.c_str(), 32); char toto[30]; sprintf(toto,"%d",val); sval = toto;};
00090 
00091       FitsKey(const string &KeyName, const string &val) :   
00092             fptr(0), sval(val) 
00093          { strncpy(keyName, KeyName.c_str(), 32); dval = atof(sval.c_str());};
00094       
00095   // conversion operators
00096   // the 5 next ones enable {int,double,string} nx = image.KeyVal("NAXIS1");
00097   operator int() ; /* those operators are not const because fits_read_key  does not pass const arguments */
00098   operator float() ;
00099   operator double() ;
00100   operator string () ;
00101   operator bool() ;
00102   string KeyName() const { return string(keyName);};
00103   friend ostream& operator <<(ostream& stream, const FitsKey &Key);
00104 
00105 };
